table.name: civicrm_case_reminder_type
table.comment: Case Reminder configurations per reminder type

field.name: case_status_id
field.comment: Case status ID(s), multi-value delimited. Implicit FK to civicrm_option_value where option_group = case_status.

field.name: recipient_relationship_type_id
field.comment: Relationship type ID(s) for recipients, multi-value delimited. Implicit FK to civicrm_relationship_type. -1 is Case Contact.

field.name: from_email_address_id
field.comment: Implicit FK to civicrm_option_value where option_group = from_email_address

field.name: max_iterations
field.comment: Maximum number of times to send a reminder of this type on any given case.
